sentences.en: Atrophy in group C alleviated and bacterial translocation rate declined ( 37.5 % ) .
sentences.cn: C组较B组 肠黏膜萎缩减轻,黏膜DNA、 RNA含量和浆细胞数目增加,mln细菌 培养阳性率 37.5%,肠细菌移位率下降.

sentences.en: But Chen Cha fragrance low and deep, bud leaf atrophy.
sentences.cn: 而陈茶则香气低沉, 芽叶萎缩.

sentences.en: CTTH patients demonstrate muscle atrophy of the rectus capitis posterior muscles.
sentences.cn: 慢性紧张型头痛患者存在头后直肌萎缩.

sentences.en: If compassion can only be activated by sustained attention, which is prevented by fast-cut editing, then the ability to be genuinely moved by another’s story could atrophy.
sentences.cn: 如果只能通过持续的关注激活同情心，而这种关注又受到快速切断编辑的阻碍，那么，被他人的故事真正打动的能力就会萎缩。

sentences.en: If you allow your mind to stagnate, this particular talent will atrophy.
sentences.cn: 如果你老不用脑，那么这一特殊才能就会退化。

sentences.en: If you don't exercise your muscles, they weaken and atrophy.
sentences.cn: 如果不锻炼你的肌肉，肌力就削弱和萎缩了。

sentences.en: More exercises can avoid atrophy of cartilage.
sentences.cn: 多加锻炼可以避免软骨萎缩。

sentences.en: Objective To summarize the related clinical factors of child brain atrophy.
sentences.cn: 目的研究小儿脑萎缩的临床相关因素.

sentences.en: Seek the place that treats optic atrophy, urgent urgent!
sentences.cn: 寻求治疗视神经萎缩的地方, 急急急!

sentences.en: Signs include pain, weakness, and rear limb muscle atrophy.
sentences.cn: 症状有:疼痛 、 虚弱和后肢肌肉萎缩.

sentences.en: Some areas of the brain, if not stimulated, will atrophy and die.
sentences.cn: 大脑的某些区域如果没有受到促进就会萎缩更甚死亡。

sentences.en: Spleen deficiency phlegm - wet storm: heavy limb pain, muscle atrophy or swelling.
sentences.cn: 脾虚湿困痰阻型: 患肢沉重疼痛, 肌肉萎缩或肿胀.

sentences.en: The compounds "likely have an effecton motor neurons"—responsible for controlling movements—"but that isa hunch at present, based on the type of atrophy we saw, " Hughes said inan email.
sentences.cn: 这些化合物“可能对运动神经元（负责控制运动）产生作用”----“根据我们观察到的萎缩症类型，目前这只是个预测，”休斯在一封电子邮件中说。

sentences.en: The pelvic examination should include an evaluation for inflammation, infection and atrophy.
sentences.cn: 盆腔检查应评价生育能力, 有否感染和萎缩.

sentences.en: The wall is thin and almost transparent probably due to atrophy of the villi.
sentences.cn: 肠壁薄,几乎是透明的,这可能是因绒毛萎缩.

sentences.en: Therefore has caused the market absorption capacity continually atrophy.
sentences.cn: 因此导致了市场容量的持续萎缩.

sentences.en: This is cerebral atrophy in a patient with Alzheimer's disease.
sentences.cn: 图示一例阿尔茨海默氏病患者萎缩的大脑.

sentences.en: Under the international finance crisis shadow, bulk commodity demand atrophy is serious.
sentences.cn: 国际金融危机阴影下, 大宗商品需求萎缩严重.

sentences.en: Unlike skeletal muscles, facial muscles do not immediately start to atrophy.
sentences.cn: 面肌不象骨骼肌, 面肌不会马上开始萎缩.

sentences.en: Varicoceles can cause pain, atrophy or infertility - and impact quality of life.
sentences.cn: 精索静脉曲张可以导致疼痛, 萎缩或不育,因此影响生活质量.

words.tran_cn: 萎缩（atrophy的过去分词）；使衰退
